experiences.description: Acquired hands-on expertise in project creation and collaborative teamwork, ensuring practical learning. Successfully developed projects, showcasing the application of theoretical knowledge. Proficient in project management and effective team collaboration, contributing to a dynamic learning environment.

Acted in over 5 theatrical productions, showcasing a range of characters and genres. Mentored and taught acting techniques to new members, fostering a supportive learning environment. Managed the societys LinkedIn page, curating content, engaging with followers, and expanding the online presence.

full_output.name: Aman Bhatt
achievements_and_awards: Secured 3rd position in Innotech-2022, the colleges annual hackathon, showcasing problem-solving skills and collaboration in a coding environment.
Attained a commendable 133rd position in Codechef Starters 94 Division 3, demonstrating strong coding proficiency and problem-solving capabilities.
Earned a 3-star rating at Codechef, signifying consistent high performance and proficiency in competitive coding challenges.
